registrations.name: append_to_file
registrations.description: Appends specified text to a file, creating the file if it does not exist.

registrations.name: list_directory_contents
registrations.description: Lists the contents of a specified directory, including both files and directories.

registrations.name: rename_file
registrations.description: Renames a file, given the file exists.

registrations.name: load_schema
registrations.description: Loads a JSON schema from a specified file, returning it as a dictionary for further use.

registrations.name: load_json_data
registrations.description: Loads JSON data from a specified file, returning it as a dictionary for processing.

registrations.name: validate_json_data
registrations.description: Validates a given JSON data against a specified schema, ensuring it meets all the required structural and data type specifications.

registrations.name: update_json_data
registrations.description: Updates and saves JSON data based on provided updates, validating against a schema to ensure data integrity.

registrations.name: modify_file_content
registrations.description: Replaces specified content in a file with new content, effectively 'backspacing' and replacing parts of the file's content.

registrations.name: read_file
registrations.description: Reads and prints the content of a specified file to the console.

registrations.name: read_file_content
registrations.description: Reads the content of a specified file and returns the content along with any error messages in a structured format.

registrations.name: run_executable
registrations.description: Runs an executable file specified by the file path, providing success status and error messages.
